00032 int main(int argc, char **argv) {
00033   typedef Cons<CommandShellPolicy, DefaultCommPolicy> MyPolicy;
00034 
00035   CommandShellPtr shell;
00036   CommandInterpreterPtr interp;

00038

00040     init_with_policy<MyPolicy>(argc, argv);
00041

00044     shell = new CommandShell("hypertable", interp, properties);

00046     interp->set_test_mode(shell->test_mode());
00047
